name: Customizable Book Mockup
description:
Customizable Book Mockup made entirely in Figma. Different textures and cover types to cover all your needs of a book cover.


Changelog:

About

This is my try to Book mockups variants in Figma. Have fun playing around with different textures and cover types.


Complete instructions can be find in the file on using the mockups.
